duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement sales strategies to qualify leads and present outsourced solutions to potential clients.
Enhance service and understanding of existing and new customers to grow the business.
Collaborate with the sales team to generate leads and identify new business opportunities.
Serve as a subject matter expert, demonstrating knowledge and emphasizing value to clients by closing leads.
Manage accounts, develop and maintain positive business relationships with existing clients.
Lead educational forums to educate and promote the value proposition of the brand within all levels of the organization.
